p: The inocula of all other bacterial strains used in this study were prepared with the direct colony suspension method in MHB. Colonies from 24 h Mueller-Hinton Agar (MHA)(BioMaxima, Lublin, Poland) plate were scraped, suspended in MHB, and adjusted to the turbidity of 0.5 McFarland standard. The density of bacterial suspension used for the microtiter plate inoculation was 1 Ã— 10 6 CFU/mL.
